original: Bolander, Eric Ghristopher, stadskamrer, Kalmar, f. 25/7/10 i Skön, Västernorrl. 1., av Karl o. Anna B. G. 36 m. Maja Berghoiltz. Barn: Björn f. 37, Leif 38. — Hand:gymn. 28, soc:-inst. i Sthlm 33. Komm :bokhåll. 29-35, istadskamrer i Vadstena 35-43, i Kalmar fr. 43.
translated: Bolander, Eric Ghristopher, city accountant, Kalmar, b. July 25th, 1910 in Skön, Västernorrl. Co. 1st, of Karl and Anna B. G. Married in 1936 to Maja Berghoiltz. Children: Björn b. 1937, Leif b. 1938. Education: Hand:gymn. in 1928, soc:-inst. in Stockholm in 1933. Career: bookkeeper from 1929-1935, city accountant in Vadstena from 1935-1943, and in Kalmar from 1943 onwards.
